ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Trading at the Bazaar.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks all. I m a trader now. In addition to having my question answered here, someone at work enlightened me to the mystery of trading to. Now yould
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:34 AM 6/25/2003 -0700, you wrote:
>You type /trader to get it started.
>Then you have to list the items and prices you want to
>get.
>
>Good Luck
>
>
>Rob

Thanks all. I'm a trader now. In addition to having my question answered
here, someone at work enlightened me to the mystery of trading to. Now
yould anyone like to buy some Shadeling silk for two silver pieces each? G.
I have noticed that there are bodied in the streets and in the trading
areas in the Bazaar. Could it be that some players are so cold that they
are actually letting their characters die from starvation and lack of
water? Tisk tisk. Hehehe.

Edward Fox
